programme.desc: The Misfit is a charismatic cub who's had a rough ride. A timid oddball once bullied by his big brothers and rejected by his mother, this plucky young lion is now a teenager.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Zambia's extraordinary Luangwa Valley is the perfect hunting ground for some of Africa's most iconic predators. Prides of lions, packs of wild dogs, clans of hyenas and solitary leopards vie for the upper hand in a land where the dry season brings prey to their doorsteps.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the savannah turns into a battleground, it‚Äôs hard to choose a hero. We‚Äôre on the edge of our safari seats as a leopard is cornered by a pride of lions, a young impala is hurled into the air by a hippo and two hyenas try to drown each other. Then, the rarest of sightings as an Aardvark runs for its life from a brown hyaena. Who will win when it‚Äôs tooth versus claw?.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Milo is a young cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, which rules a territory on the west bank of the Luangwa River. 20-strong it's ruled by the notorious Punks, a coalition of three strong brothers, it's the largest pride for miles around, giving Milo the best start in life. But, in lion society, cubs are the glue that binds a pride.

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: We will travel from South to North and explore the remotest corners of the Appalachian Trail and meet the scientists fighting to keep this wilderness wild. .

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: National Geographic Television joins a rare scientific odyssey to explore the Canyon's entire 277-mile length and examine its mysteries.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol‚Äôs new livestock aren‚Äôt potty trained; their sheep hut isn‚Äôt draining properly and has now been transformed into a Pee Palace. It‚Äôs late fall and the winter deep freeze is just around the corner, so the family needs to get it fixed fast. The Pol‚Äôs also get a new sheep for their farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol clan gets to work on creating Beth‚Äôs dream garden. To beat the incoming rainstorm, an exhausted Ben works around the clock to finish building the garden‚Äôs pond and waterfall. Noticing her brother is near his breaking point, Beth plans a special surprise to lift his spirits.

programme.title: Most Wanted Sharks
programme.desc: There are millions of sharks in our oceans, but a select few are so fascinating, they've become worldwide celebrities. Whether it's the biggest great white, the most photographed tiger shark, or the shark known for jumping 100 feet up out of the water, we're diving into the stories of the greatest shark stars of all time, each with their own legion of social media followers.

programme.title: Africa's River Titans
programme.desc: Africa is a land of giants. Its powerful rivers sculpt the earth and form impressive valleys and waterways home to many imposing and powerful inhabitants. These are the rivers where massive elephants and hippos live, feed and drink and where ancient crocodiles hunt and breed.

programme.title: Perfect Predator
programme.desc: From their massive size, strength and stamina to their finely tuned hunting skills and unrelenting will to survive‚Äîsharks have evolved to be the perfect predator. But how do they do it? In this action-packed hour, unlock key evolutionary components that have kept these apex predators on top for millions of years. .

programme.title: Amazonia
programme.desc: At more than 4,000 miles long, the worlds mightiest river -- the Amazon -- is an inland ocean, teeming with life.

programme.title: Death At The River
programme.desc: Embark on a riveting journey along the untamed waters of Africa, where the rivers teem with life, and witness the breathtaking struggle for survival against extreme droughts, cunning predators, and opportunistic hunters of all sizes. Africa's rivers, a paradise for predators, become the arena where prey and predator engage in a relentless dance for life.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close With Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the ocean‚Äôs most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. It‚Äôs highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: Sharks Of The North
programme.desc: Sightings of great white sharks have been on the rise in Atlantic Canada. Alanna Canaran, a passionate science educator and dive instructor, embarks on a mission to unravel the enigmas surrounding these magnificent creatures and is determined to dispel fear of sharks in Nova Scotians. As the journey unfolds, Canaran and her team dive into the history of human-shark relationships along the coast.

programme.title: World's Biggest Tiger Shark?
programme.desc: Marine biologist, Kori Garza and underwater cameraman, Andy Casagrande are in French Polynesia and on the trail of Kamakai, a huge female Tiger shark first seen by Kori six months ago on a research dive. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: An ice storm shuts down the clinic and newborn labs are melting hearts. When treacherous weather leaves injured animals in its wake, Dr. Pol and his team slide in to fix busted hips and toe tips. Dr. Lisa handles a demanding delivery while Dr. Brenda impresses by corralling cattle and wrangling racehorses.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol races against the clock to save the life of a mother cow. A whirlwind of emergencies keeps Doc out on nonstop farm calls while his team of vets keep the clinic covered. Dr. Nicole is called to check on a beloved reindeer. Dr. Lisa removes a suspicious growth from a sheep dog and Dr. Brenda treats a puppy that is losing weight.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles ‚ÄúThe Superzeros,‚Äù a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. Forget about the cheetah‚Äôs speed and the eagle‚Äôs eyesight; and say hello to the invisible glass frog, the indestructible honey badger and the might of the pistol shrimp who can fire bubbles hotter than the sun.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan shares his distinct take on the underdogs using gross-out tactics to win the game of life. With manatees using flatulence to control their buoyancy to cave-dwelling fungus gnats creating beautifully illuminated flytraps with mucus from their butts, these underdogs are out to prove who may be the grossest survivor of them all.
